TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed HostProtectionResource extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies categories of functionality potentially harmful to the host if invoked by a method or class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute.
## Examples The following code example shows the use of the HostProtectionResource enumeration with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute. This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class.
[!code-cs[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.security.permis_16_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.security.permis_16_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.1.1#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.security.permis_16_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource All = int32(511)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource ExternalProcessMgmt = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Might create or destroy other processes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource ExternalThreading = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Creates or manipulates threads other than its own, which might be harmful to the host.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource MayLeakOnAbort = int32(256)

Docs.summary: Might cause a resource leak on termination, if not protected by a safe handle or some other means of ensuring the release of resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource SecurityInfrastructure = int32(64)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource SelfAffectingProcessMgmt = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Might exit the current process, terminating the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource SelfAffectingThreading = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Manipulates threads in a way that only affects user code.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource SharedState = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Exposes state that might be shared between threads.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource Synchronization = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource UI = int32(128)
